opponent.label: Aqua
opponent.artist: MyMainAccIsANord (Model, Posing), Nomelet (Image Attachments), Zeuses Swan Song (Hair)
opponent.description: A Keyblade Master who has traveled to many worlds to protect her friends, Aqua is an elegant, brave fighter. However, she is lacking when it comes to having intimate social experiences.

epilogue.hint: Finish a game against Aqua, from Kingdom Hearts.<hr><font color="navy">To unlock additional content, play with these conditions:</font> Win against Aqua with 6 or fewer layers, with a full set of 4 opponents, and without Chara present.
